customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Even mercenaries of great skill can find it hard to escape from harm should they accidentally enter a place most dangerous. Atiyah knows this quite well, and considers it strongly when recruiting new members. He has heard plenty of spin-chilling tales from those of the same walk of life as him, after all...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule â€” Withering Corrosion: After your opponent uses a Skill, remove 1 Candle of Life point. Once 4 Candle of Life points are depleted, you lose the match.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
